path_title: Mrunmayi's Digital Empowerment Pathway: Data Entry Specialist
path_description: This personalized learning path will equip Mrunmayi with essential digital literacy and data entry skills to pursue various administrative and data-focused roles.

milestones.title: Foundational Digital Literacy
milestones.description: Mastering basic computer operations, internet navigation, and online safety.
milestones.project: Create a personal email account, send professional emails, and research online resources relevant to data entry jobs.

milestones.title: Introduction to Data Entry and Typing Skills
milestones.description: Developing accurate and efficient typing skills and understanding basic data entry principles.
skills: Basic spreadsheet usage (e.g., Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel)
milestones.project: Complete online typing tests to improve speed and accuracy, create a sample data entry spreadsheet for a fictional business.

milestones.title: Intermediate Data Entry and Spreadsheet Skills
milestones.description: Building proficiency in spreadsheet software and applying data entry techniques for various business needs.
milestones.project: Design and populate a comprehensive spreadsheet for inventory management or customer data, including data analysis and visualization.

milestones.title: Data Integrity and Database Fundamentals
milestones.description: Learning about data integrity principles and basic database concepts for effective data management.
skills: Understanding data integrity and its importance
Data entry into online forms and databases
milestones.project: Create a simple database using online tools like Google Forms or Airtable to manage information for a community project or a small business.

milestones.title: Professional Communication and Soft Skills
milestones.description: Developing essential soft skills for workplace success, including communication and collaboration.
milestones.project: Participate in mock interviews and practice professional communication scenarios, collaborate with peers on a data entry project.

career_opportunities.title: Data Entry Operator
career_opportunities.description: Entering data into various systems and ensuring its accuracy and integrity for businesses and organizations.

career_opportunities.title: Administrative Assistant
career_opportunities.description: Providing administrative support, including data entry, scheduling, and communication, in various office settings.

career_opportunities.title: Freelance Data Entry Specialist
career_opportunities.description: Offering data entry services remotely to clients worldwide, providing flexibility and independence.
